org.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM current_nodes INNER JOIN current_way_nodes ON current_nodes.id = current_way_nodes.node_id WHERE current_way_nodes.way_id = "$1"

rewrites.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM current_nodes INNER JOIN current_way_nodes ON current_nodes.id = current_way_nodes.node_id WHERE current_way_nodes.way_id = "$1" LIMIT 1
